Title: Requires course work or training in menopausal health for certain professions
Summary: Requires course work or training in menopausal health for physicians, physician assistants, nurses, mental health practitioners, psychologists and social workers.
LawCode: Add §267-c, Pub Health L; add §6505-f, amd §§7710, 8412 & 7607, Ed L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the public health law and the education law, in relation to requiring course work or training in menopausal health for certain professions
